sentences.en: Credit is credit, and rumours are only rumours: we mustn't let ourselves get flustered.
sentences.cn: 信用自信用, 谣言自谣言; 我们也要不慌不忙.

sentences.en: I always get flustered in interviews.
I enjoy them but was flustered by its extravagance.
sentences.cn: 我既觉得高兴又为其过分铺张而紧张不安.

sentences.en: I enjoyed them, but was flustered by the extravagance.
sentences.cn: 我喜爱鲜花, 可又为这种奢侈而不安.

sentences.en: If you get flustered around your crush, try to be natural around.
sentences.cn: 如果你跟你迷恋的对象在一起的时候, 最好表现得自然些.

sentences.en: Is recently always flustered insomnia how is headaching to return a responsibility?
sentences.cn: 最近总是心慌失眠头疼是怎么回事?

sentences.en: Mary was all flustered up just before the wedding.
sentences.cn: 玛丽在婚礼举行前紧张得不知所措.

sentences.en: May was all flustered up just before the wedding.
Mo Kan - cheng was flustered, and his miserable expression was almost laughable.
sentences.cn: 莫干丞慌慌张张回答, 他那脸上的神气非常可笑.

sentences.en: Paul was looking flustered and embarrassed.
sentences.cn: 保罗看上去神情慌乱，一脸窘迫。

sentences.en: She was so flustered that she forgot her reply.
sentences.cn: 她太紧张了，都忘记了该如何作答。

sentences.en: The honking of horns flustered the boy.
sentences.cn: 汽车喇叭的叫声使男孩感到慌乱.

sentences.en: They were saying that you got a little bit flustered under certain circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他们说你在特定的情况下会变得有点慌乱.

sentences.en: Tom stood still, rather flustered by this onslaught.
sentences.cn: 汤姆被这一阵辱骂弄得不知所措,站着不动.

sentences.en: Why is I sleep in the evening recently always flustered and wake?
sentences.cn: 为什么我最近晚上睡觉总是心慌而醒?

sentences.en: Xiangzi really was a bit flustered.

trans.tran_cn: 使慌乱，使不安( fluster的过去式和过去分词)
